tool.name: SAGA.grid_tools.37
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayGRID False output_data_OUTPUT $output_data_OUTPUT name SAGA.grid_tools.37 GRID $GRID prefer $prefer response $response outputType_OUTPUT $OutputSection_OUTPUT.outputType_OUTPUT transmissionMode_OUTPUT $OutputSection_OUTPUT.transmissionMode_OUTPUT

param.name: GRID
param.label: Grid
param.help: Grid The following data types are allowed in the txt file: png, x-ogc-aaigrid, x-ogc-envi, tiff

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_OUTPUT
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_OUTPUT
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: Based on the look-up table classfication of a grid, this tool allows to change and combine class belongings of the cells.
